Text: Seem to me a great rip and its mkv. But i found a dual audio English/Hindi in mkv and its quality is lower than this one. Im stuck which to download.

If you have a limited bandwith, it could be a problem, but if you dont, you can download both, and re-mux the video from here, and include the hindi (audio) from the other source. =D (use mkvmerge, its fairly simple)

But if you have a limited bandwith, you have to choose! Or you can try to find hindi subtitle.
